adjective.description: Having a bulbous or swollen nose, which resembles a round-bottomed bottle.
Having a protruding end or snout resembling (the neck of) a bottle; especially (of a cetacean) having the jaws extended into a distinctive short beak or rostrum.

origin: Mid 16th century; earliest use found in Lewis Wager (d. 1562), playwright. From bottle + nosed.
